Class CameraStreamingService

  • java.lang.Object
    • to.sven.androidrccar.host.service.impl.CameraStreamingService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICameraStreamingService

    public class CameraStreamingService
extends java.lang.Object
implements ICameraStreamingService
    Activates streaming of the camera over network.
    Author:
    sven
